reviewText: This has to be the best collection of SID the Science KID! My daughter is obsessed with SID, she is just over a year old and has watched SID for a while now. We had to have some on dvd at our disposal. She absolutely loves the music and all the songs that are on every episode will have any parent singing along eventually, especially mommies;"I love my mom, my mom is cool!" I love the hygiene and educational messages. This has to be a highly recommended show. This collection is well worth it. Her daddy got her the music dvd and we were pretty disappointed because none of the "regular" songs were on there: just fyi : GET THIS ONE INSTEAD!
summary: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE, hours of educational entertainment
Title: N/A

reviewText: My toddlers would watch Sid all day.  Very educational, each DVD is pretty long so its great for playtime and learning.
Title: N/A

reviewText: My niece loves Sid the Science Kid and I was happy to find so many DVDs out there to buy.  This three pack was inexpensive and has hours of Sid shows on them.  The show teaches lots of concepts like brushing teeth, what foods to eat all the time or only sometimes, germs, and many others.  The show is on PBS but it is more convenient to have the DVDs on hand to watch anytime.
Title: N/A

reviewText: I bought this for the grandkids and they just love to watch it.  It's good entertainment for them and they sure do like it.

reviewText: My 4 and 7 year old get so much out of these shows. I purchase whenever I can. They use the learned concepts in their every day play.
